## Site Structure

- [Home](https://rmullur.github.io/): Main page with author bio and latest writings
- [About](https://rmullur.github.io/about): Detailed profile and background
- [Writing](https://rmullur.github.io/writing): Essays and reflections on technology, software, and craft
